overview: Alina Long - Alina is taking care of a hung over Bill. She suggests he takes a bath, and once she walk in on him naked she just can't contain herself!  Jezebelle Bond - Jezebelle is trying to get James to buy her used car. He thinks it's too expensive, but Jezebelle knows how to use her body to negotiate.  Sarah Sloane - Sarah used to babysit Tyler when he was a lot younger. Now that he's all grown up, Sarah can't wait to take advantage of his manhood.  Sovereign Syre - Tommy goes over to Sovereign's place to get his laptop back. When Sovereign catches him watching porn and jacking off, she offers to help him out.
title: MILFS Seeking Boys 8
